title: Taliban Prisoner Swap For Bergdahl Was To Be Part Of Bigger Deal
teaser: The exchange of detainees for Bowe Bergdahl was supposed to be part of a bigger peace process. Renee Montagne talks to Marc Grossman, former U.S. special representative for Afghanistan and Pakistan.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
